# Create reproduce script and run a simple check using the local matplotlib code
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.widgets import SpanSelector

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot([10,20],[10,20])
ss = SpanSelector(ax, print, "horizontal", interactive=True)
# Instead of showing, we'll inspect ax.get_xlim()
print('xlim after creating span selector:', ax.get_xlim())
PY

args.command:
python - << 'PY'
# Create reproduce script and run a simple check using the local matplotlib code
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.widgets import SpanSelector

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot([10,20],[10,20])
ss = SpanSelector(ax, print, "horizontal", interactive=True)
# Instead of showing, we'll inspect ax.get_xlim()
print('xlim after creating span selector:', ax.get_xlim())
PY
